Plot: Based on the video game, Alone in the Dark focuses on Edward Carnby, a detective of the paranormal, who slowly unravels mysterious events with deadly results.
Title: Alone in the Dark
Writer: Elan Mastai, Michael Roesch, Peter Scheerer
Actors: Christian Slater, Tara Reid, Stephen Dorff, Frank C. Turner
tomatoConsensus: Inept on almost every level, Alone in the Dark may not work as a thriller, but it's good for some head-slapping, incredulous laughter.
